title: Ed Jameson | Four Parts of the Universe: Prequel
description: Here is one of four free short stories by Darren H. Pryce.Some time ago, they all existed in their separate worlds. Different, but exciting in their own ways. Matt Leutte, Charlie Chester, Ed Jameson, and Rain Kaudenne. What were they like before they've became “Four Parts of the Universe”?These four prequels are in fact independent novellas about some important moments in life. Some are funny, some are deep and even tragic, some may help you take a look at the past.Thank you for downloading, enjoy the moments, spent with Four Parts!
author: Darren H. Pryce
